definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The fields have reverted to moorland .
sentences.chinese: 这些田地又恢复成荒地。

sentences.english: Tried-and-true methods mix with fresh concepts to create better wildland fleets .
sentences.chinese: 试用真实方法混合新鲜理念，创造出更好的荒地船队。

sentences.english: Contractors have started building on waste land near the town.
sentences.chinese: 承包商在城附近的荒地上开始从事营造业。

sentences.english: Glebe's old hero bereavement, Hugh death cause.
sentences.chinese: 天荒地老英雄丧，国破家亡事业休。

sentences.english: Without love, nothing grows and the hillsides become barren wastelands.
sentences.chinese: 没有爱，什么都无法生长，山坡于是成了贫瘠的荒地。

sentences.english: I have not hid in the bottom of my heart, that is I a person's death.
sentences.chinese: 涐把舍不得都藏在心底，那是涐一个人旳天荒地老。

sentences.english: Within a few years they had transferred barren wastes into fertile fields.
sentences.chinese: 几年之内他们就把荒地变成了良田。

sentences.english: They are turning waste land into paddy fields.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在使荒地变为稻田。

sentences.english: Love, I want to continue to continue until the end of time.
sentences.chinese: 爱情，我希望能够继续延续下去，直到天荒地老。

sentences.english: This moorland is covering block, fireweed is fascicular, everywhere bumpy.
sentences.chinese: 这片荒地覆盖着石块，杂草丛生，到处坑坑洼洼。

sentences.english: If we get the manpower, we weselves open up even lot lor.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人力，咱们还能开更多的荒地。

sentences.english: No one wants to wait for you, do not say wait until forever in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 没有人愿意等你，也不必说等到天荒地老，海枯石烂。

sentences.english: Love to everlasting, the final outcome again how.
sentences.chinese: 爱到天荒地老，最后的结局又能怎样。

sentences.english: Or with your family, friends, lovers, chatting until the end of the world.
sentences.chinese: 或是和家人，朋友，恋人坐著聊天到天荒地老。

definition: to clear a wild area for cultivation/to put under the plow
left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
to abandon/to let go to waste
